vclaim: U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden said that Americans were able to stay home during the COVID-19 pandemic because "some Black woman was able to stack the grocery shelf."
title: Did Biden Say Americans Could Stay Home During Pandemic Because ‘Some Black Woman’ Stocked Grocery Shelves?
subtitle: A 10-second-clip from a 90-minute event was missing some context.
author: Dan Evon
